parameters.name: Addresses
parameters.description: The addresses of the office applications. You can enter up to 1,000 addresses of office applications.

parameters.name: BrowserAccessStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to allow access from a browser. Default value: **Disabled**. Valid values:

*   **Enabled**
*   **Disabled**

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the office application. The value must be 1 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), hyphens (-), and spaces.

parameters.name: L7Config
parameters.description: The browser access mode parameter. The parameter specifies the configurations of Layer 7 applications.

parameters.name: L7ProxyDomainAutomaticPrefix
parameters.description: The browser access mode parameter. The parameter specifies the prefix of the domain name that the proxy gateway uses. The prefix must be 3 to 20 characters in length, and can contain lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: L7ProxyDomainCustom
parameters.description: The browser access mode parameter. The parameter specifies the custom domain name of the proxy gateway. Enter a valid domain name.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the office application. The value must be 1 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: PortRanges
parameters.description: The port ranges of the office applications. You can enter up to 65,535 port ranges. Multiple port ranges cannot be duplicated or overlapped.

parameters.name: Protocol
parameters.description:
The protocol that is used by the office application. Valid values:

*   **All**
*   **TCP**
*   **UDP**

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the office application. Valid values:

*   **Enabled**
*   **Disabled**

parameters.name: TagIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the tags for the office applications. You can add up to six custom tags to an office application.
